structure.unit: HOTEL, FOOD SERVICE, AND MOBILE HOME AND RECREATIONAL VEHICLE PARK REGULATIONS

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 10. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2059a-8.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Individual towels -- Beds and bedding -- Disinfection of rooms.
